name: EmbeddedPages
description: Webpack boilerplate to create Targetprocess mashup.

scripts.build:library: outputPath=build/library; rm -rf $outputPath; NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/library.config.js --output-path $outputPath --progress; npm run build:library:docs
scripts.build:manager: outputPath=build/manager; rm -rf $outputPath; NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/manager.config.js --output-path $outputPath --progress; cat $outputPath/*.js > $outputPath/index.js; rm $outputPath/mashup.config.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:library && npm run build:manager

author: Targetprocess <dev@targetprocess.com>
